name: Weddings
description: A wedding is a celebration or ceremony of marriage. Besides being a formal way to mark the union of two people, weddings can be a lot of fun too.

name: Birthday Parties
description: A birthday party is a celebratory event held to mark the anniversary of a persons birth.It is a special occasion where friends and family gather to honor.

name: Anniversaries
description: An anniversary is a date which is remembered or celebrated because a special event happened on that date in a previous year.

name: Engagement Parties
description: An engagement party is a celebration of the proposal, and the first event to kick off your festivities leading up to the wedding day.

name: Retirement Parties
description: If you or someone you know is retiring, there's cause for celebration. After years of hard work and dedication, a retirement party is a great way to honor your legacy.

name: Baby shower
description: A baby shower is a party centered on gift-giving to celebrate the delivery or expected birth of a child, and the transformation of a woman into a mother.
